Combined Summary Tables
```{r}
summary_csvs <- list.files(path = here("giab-tibanna-runs"), pattern = "summary", full.names = TRUE, recursive = TRUE)
summary_df <- summary_csvs %>% 
        set_names(., nm = str_remove(., ".*/")) %>% 
        map_dfr(read_csv, .id ="evaluation") %>% 
        mutate(HPRCID = str_extract(evaluation,pattern = "(HPRC-=<?).*"))
```
